citations.narrative:
On each of 10/19/23, 10/28/23, and 1/10/24, 1 adult dog was found deceased with injuries attributed to fighting amongst
dogs in a shared exercise space. The space was otherwise sufficiently sized and structured per the AWA regulations for
the number of dogs utilizing it at a given time. Dogs housed in the same primary enclosures must be compatible to
minimize risk of fighting, injury, and death. Compatibility with other dogs when grouped must be addressed.
Correct by 6/4/24.

While the facility maintains records of rabies vaccination for all dogs, it does not document the names and dates of
administration of other vaccines. Recording the names and dates of administration of all vaccines helps ascertain
adherence to a facility's written program of veterinary care. The facility must begin documenting these vaccines.
Correct by 6/13/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.7  Critical
   
Compatible grouping. 
On each of 10/19/23, 10/28/23, and 1/10/24, 1 adult dog was found deceased with injuries attributed to fighting amongst 
dogs in a shared exercise space. The space was otherwise sufficiently sized and structured per the AWA regulations for 
the number of dogs utilizing it at a given time. Dogs housed in the same primary enclosures must be compatible to 
minimize risk of fighting, injury, and death. Compatibility with other dogs when grouped must be addressed.  
 
Correct by 6/4/24. 
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
While the facility maintains records of rabies vaccination for all dogs, it does not document the names and dates of 
administration of other vaccines. Recording the names and dates of administration of all vaccines helps ascertain 
adherence to a facility's written program of veterinary care. The facility must begin documenting these vaccines.  
 
Correct by 6/13/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
